content: Great write-up! It’s awesome for front-end devs like me to see Javascript get the recognition it deserves. The “complicated mess of tooling” problem is something being worked on by quite a few people. The most elegant solution I’ve seen is Facebook’s create-react-app. It’s not perfect for everyone (it’s specifically for tackling front-end React projects), but it abstracts away all the bundling/transpiling concerns beautifully.
